prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Will Stefan initiate contact with me between now and 11:59 PM EST February 4th, 2025?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a systematic list of relevant chart data based solely on horary principles for your query, “Will Stefan initiate contact with me between now and 11:59 PM EST February 4th, 2025?” The data is organized by planetary positions, house placements (with special reference to your Ascendant and the house representing Stefan), key aspects, and chart patterns.

■ Planetary Positions
• Sun: 15° Aquarius
• Moon: 23°31′ Aries
• Mercury: 10°54′ Aquarius
• Venus: 29°31′ Pisces
• Mars (retrograde): 19°42′ Cancer
• Jupiter (retrograde): 11°16′ Gemini
• Saturn: 17°43′ Pisces
• Uranus: 23°16′ Taurus
• Neptune: 28°02′ Pisces
• Pluto: 2°08′ Aquarius
• North Node (retrograde): 29°42′ Pisces
• Chiron: 19°35′ Aries

■ House Placements (using the provided chart data)
• Ascendant (Your represented self): 19°33′ Taurus
 – Ruler: Venus (located at 29°31′ Pisces)
• 1st House: Taurus (contains Jupiter and Uranus)
• 2nd House: Gemini
• 3rd House: Cancer (contains Mars)
• 4th House: Cancer
• 5th House: Leo
• 6th House: Libra
• 7th House: Scorpio
• 8th House: Sagittarius
• 9th House: Capricorn (begins at 10° Capricorn)
 – As per your instruction, the 9th house represents “Stefan.”
• 10th House: Capricorn (contains Sun, Mercury, Pluto)
• 11th House: Aquarius (contains Venus, Saturn, Neptune, North Node)
• 12th House: Aries (contains Moon and Chiron)
 – Note from your cross-reference: With Stefan represented by the 9th house, the corresponding significator for him is linked to the 12th house (in this chart, the Moon and Chiron in Aries become relevant).

■ Key Aspects (orb limits indicated; only those with 6° orb or tighter are listed to remain focused on immediate influences)
• Neptune Sextile MC (orb: 0°)
• Mars Sextile Ascendant (orb: 0°)
• Mars Square Chiron (orb: 0°)
• MC Opposition IC (orb: 0°)
• Venus Conjunction North Node (orb: 0°)
• Neptune Trine IC (orb: 0°)
• North Node Sextile MC (orb: 1°)
• Venus Sextile MC (orb: 1°)
• Neptune Conjunction North Node (orb: 1°)
• Venus Conjunction Neptune (orb: 1°)
• North Node Trine IC (orb: 1°)
• Venus Trine IC (orb: 1°)
• Mercury Trine Jupiter (orb: 1°)
• Saturn Sextile Ascendant (orb: 2°)
• Mars Trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
• Pluto Sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
• Venus Sextile Pluto (orb: 3°)
• Mars Sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
• Sun Sextile Chiron (orb: 4°)
• Moon Square Mars (orb: 4°)
• Sun Square Ascendant (orb: 4°)
• Pluto Opposition IC (orb: 4°)
• Pluto Conjunction MC (orb: 4°)
• Uranus Conjunction Ascendant (orb: 4°)
• Moon Conjunction Chiron (orb: 4°)
• Sun Trine Jupiter (orb: 4°)
• Uranus Sextile IC (orb: 5°)
• Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
• Moon Square IC (orb: 5°)
• Moon Square MC (orb: 5°)
• Sun Conjunction Mercury (orb: 5°)
• Uranus Trine MC (orb: 5°)
• Saturn Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
• Venus Sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
• Jupiter Square Saturn (orb: 6°)
• Mercury Conjunction Pluto (orb: 8°)

■ Chart Patterns and Configurations
• Stellium in Aquarius region:
 – Pluto at 2° Aquarius, Sun at 15° Aquarius, Mercury at 10° Aquarius, and Pluto on the Midheaven in Capricorn.
• T-Square:
 – Formed by MC in 28° Capricorn, Moon in 23° Aries, and IC in 28° Cancer.
• Cradle Pattern (“Cradle”):
 – Involving Pluto (2° Aquarius), IC (28° Cancer), Uranus (23° Taurus), Venus (29° Pisces), MC (28° Capricorn), and Neptune (28° Pisces).
• Additional Notable Configurations:
 – Bowl-shaped chart configuration.
 – Majority of inner planets positioned in the top and left (west) hemisphere relative to the MC–IC axis.
 – Ascendant in Taurus with its ruler Venus prominently placed in the 11th House (a key factor in relationship and outreach matters).
 – By cross-reference, Stefan’s association is linked to the 9th house in the primary chart and thus connects to the 12th house significators (Moon and Chiron in Aries).

All data cited above is drawn directly from the horary chart you provided. This listing forms the foundation needed to proceed with an interpretation under horary principles.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the horary chart for your query, several factors require consideration.

1. The querent is represented by the Ascendant in Taurus. Its ruler, Venus at 29° Pisces in the 11th house, appears favorably as it forms multiple harmonious aspects (conjunct North Node, sextile Pluto, sextile MC, and in a Neptune conjunction). This placement indicates that you carry a receptive, attractive energy that encourages connection, yet the involvement of planets in a sensitive house (the 11th) suggests that your network, friendships, or group settings may be key to the unfolding event.

2. Stefan is assigned to the 9th house, cross-referenced with the 12th house where the primary significators (Moon and Chiron in Aries) reside. The Moon, often the primary significator for messages and movements, is in Aries—a sign of impulsivity and rapid change. However, its conjunction with Chiron introduces an element of vulnerability or a hidden wound, suggesting Stefan’s actions are emotionally charged and possibly conflicted. The Moon’s 4° square to Mars (in Cancer, retrograde) reinforces the possibility of tension, aggression, or delay affecting his communication.

3. Further, the T-Square involving the Moon, MC, and IC emphasizes dynamic tension in the chart. The Moon’s role within this configuration—especially being caught in a square from Mars—may denote obstacles or internal conflicts that hinder a straightforward initiation of contact. The stellium in Aquarius (including the Sun and Mercury near the Midheaven) speaks more to circumstances surrounding your broader situation rather than directly about Stefan’s initiative.

4. Uranus’s conjunction to the Ascendant injects a note of unpredictability and the potential for sudden breakthroughs. This influence suggests that while traditional planning or timing may be disrupted, an unexpected development remains possible. Yet for Stefan’s significators, such sudden energy does not appear as dominant, indicating that while you might experience unexpected shifts, his deliberate move may still be hampered by internal hesitation or unresolved issues.

5. Overall, the chart shows that while your personal energy is strong and ready to receive contact (with Venus well-placed), Stefan’s approach is less assured. The Moon—his primary ally—carries mixed influences: its impulsive nature in Aries is counterbalanced by the troublesome influence of Chiron and its square to Mars, which implies friction or delay. The interplay of these factors challenges the likelihood of a timely and uncomplicated initiation from his side.

Based on the planetary positions, aspects, and configurations, the chart suggests that though contact from Stefan is not entirely ruled out, his initiation is likely to be irregular, potentially marked by sudden, conflicted actions or internal hesitation. Should his energies find resolution, an unexpected gesture might emerge, but the prevailing tensions indicate that relying solely on his initiative may result in disappointment or delays.

The evidence in your horary chart leans toward advising active engagement from your end rather than waiting for a clear, unobstructed signal from Stefan.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, madam. Can you help me to formulate a question that I can ask a new chart? Here's what I would like to know. First and foremost, should I initiate contact with Stefan? And secondly, if I do, what can I expect to hear back from him? In other words, how will it affect him? Will I get a response and what could I expect the response might look like?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
adjusts her ornate shawl thoughtfully while considering your questions

For the most accurate reading regarding initiating contact and its potential outcomes, I suggest we frame a single, clear horary question that encompasses both aspects. The art lies in the precise wording to capture the full scope of what you seek to understand.

I recommend phrasing your question as follows:

"If I initiate contact with Stefan now, what will be the nature and outcome of our interaction through February 4th, 2025?"

This formulation allows us to:
1. Address whether you should initiate contact (shown by the chart's immediate aspects)
2. See potential responses (through planetary movements and aspects)
3. Understand the emotional dynamics (through lunar positions and aspects)
4. Identify any obstacles or favorable conditions (through house placements and dignities)

adjusts one of her rings, a deep purple amethyst catching the candlelight
